No matter when an election is held to replace Lee, Kirsten Gillibrand is confident his district will be well represented. They have representation right now, through myself and Senator Chuck Schumer , every minute of every day. Senator Chuck Schumer and I are committed to making sure their voice in Washington is as strong as it's ever been. will resurrect a hallowed nameplate- the Grand Wagoneer- in two years. ''It's time we gave the market an upper-scale Grand Wagoneer,'' Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne said at the Detroit auto show. You'll see it in January 2013. The Grand Wagoneer would be a seven-seat SUV built on the same platform as the Grand Cherokee and the Dodge Durango. My heart is broken and my blood is boiling, the U.S.-trained archaeologist lamented. Jane Lynch , the 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. ''He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
